data.title: Robyn Moore Gibson: Facts About The Ex-Wife Of Mel Gibson
data.meta_description: Robyn Moore Gibson is a Nurse and also the ex-wife of Mel Columcille Gerard Gibson known as Mel Gibson. Mel Gibson is an American actor, film director, and producer best known for his action hero roles. Read on and have a look at the below-written post to know more about Robyn Moore Gibson.
data.text:
Robyn Moore Gibson is a Nurse and also the ex-wife of Mel Columcille Gerard Gibson known as Mel Gibson. Mel Gibson is an American actor, film director, and producer best known for his action hero roles. Read on and have a look at the below-written post to know more about Robyn Moore Gibson.

Robyn Moore Gibson: Bio Summary

Who Is Robyn Moore Gibson?

Robyn Moore Gibson is an Australian born in Adelaide, Australia. Robyn is famous as the ex-wife of Hollywood star Mel Gibson who played the role of Max Rockatansky in the first three films of the post-apocalyptic series, Mad Max, and as Martin Riggs in the buddy cop film series Lethal Weapon.

Robyn is educated but her educational qualification is unknown. We do not have data about where she attended high school or college.

Robyn Denise Moore Career

Robyn Denise Moore has a successful career of her own but is not famous for that. She is famous as the ex-wife of Mel Gibson rather than her career.

Robyn and Mel Gibson are divorced yet Robyn is renowned as his wife to date. Robyn has worked as a dental nurse. She is a public speaker, voice-over artist, and television personality.

Robyn has voiced several cartoon characters and has worked in numerous radio advertisements and television commercials. She took part in radio shows and started hosting her show called How Green Was My Cactus, in 1986.

Robyn Moore has worked in the Blinky Bill series as she voiced multiple female characters in the animated series. She has worked as a voice-over artist in comedy shows and TV commercials too. She is a philanthropist who has actively been involved in fundraising events and supports the Make a Wish organization, a non-profit organization that works towards the welfare of children.

ALSO, READ: Louis Gibson: Inside The Life Of Mel Gibsonâs Son

How Did Robyn Denise Moore And Mel Gibson Meet

Robyn and Mel Gibson met in Adelaide, South Australia in the late 1970s. When they met Robyn was a dental nurse while Mel was an upcoming stage actor who was working for the South Australian Theatre Company.

Currently, Mel Gibson has been successful in his career and is considered one of the international stars who has earned acclaim as an actor, film director, and producer. He has won awards and honors for his work in the entertainment industry.

When Did Robyn Denise Moore And Mel Gibson Get Married?

Robyn Moore and Mel Gibson got married in a Catholic church in Forestville, New South Wales on June 7, 1980. They were both reportedly 24 years old when they married.

The couple stayed together as husband and wife and after about 26 years of marriage, they decided to get separated. They decided to separate on July 29, 2006.

Mel Gibson and Robyn had children together. Their kids are 7, namely; Hannah born in 1980, Edward born in 1982, Christian born in 1982, William born in 1985, Louis born in 1988, Milo born in 1990, and Thomas born in 1999.

Robyn Denise Moore And Mel Gibsonâs Divorce

Robyn Moore and Mel Gibsonâs divorce was in the news and it caught the attention of several people. Mel mentioned in an interview, in 2011 that his divorce from his now ex-wife, Robyn Moore started the day following his arrest for driving drunk in Malibu.

On April 13, 2009, Robyn filed for divorce from Mel Gibson referring to some irreconcilable differences. In a joint statement, the Gibsons proclaimed that âThroughout our marriage and separation we have always striven to maintain the privacy and integrity of our family and will continue to do so.â

Also Read: Shayla Somer Gibson:Facts About Tyrese Gibsonâs Daughter

During the divorce filing photographs of Mel embracing Russian songwriter and pianist Oksana Grigorieva on a beach surfaced. Mel and Robyn had been separated for over 18 months before Oksana started seeing Mel, according to Oksana.

However, the divorce was finalized on December 23, 2011. The settlement with his Robyn was said to be the highest in Hollywood history at over $400 million.
